title: Oyone to Mattsan: Ai no Uta
original_name: オヨネと松っっぁん愛の唄
sinopse: A story set in the countryside of Japan. Two teens meet and slowly fall in love. Their relationship has difficulties developing as her father doesn't approve of the boy's request for her hand in marriage. Part of the OVA features a karaoke-style songs with lyrics present on-screen.
